tool.name: ipaPy2 compute all adducts
tool.description: compute the compound database with adducts

param.label: Adducts data
param.name: adducts_data
param.help: A csv,tsv,tabular or parquet file containing information on all possible adducts.

param.label: MS database
param.name: MS1_DB
param.help: A csv,tsv,tabular or parquet file containing the MS1 database.

tool.help:
Summary This step calculates all possible combinations of adducts and compounds given the adduct and compound databases. It is therefore recommended to not repeat this step if not necessary and to re-use a previously calculated database with adducts. If a new adduct-database needs to be computed, make sure to only include the adducts that you would really expect in the data (e.g. only the actually used ionization mode, multimers, adducts based on mobile phase).
Example of `adducts.csv` file:
.. list-table:: Example adducts.csv :header-rows: 1
* - name - calc - Charge - Mult - Mass - Ion_mode - Formula_add - Formula_ded - Multi * - [M+H]+ - 1.0073 - 1 - 1 - 1.0073 - positive - H - FALSE - 1 * - [M+Na]+ - 22.9892 - 1 - 1 - 22.9892 - positive - Na - FALSE - 1 * - [M+K]+ - 38.9632 - 1 - 1 - 38.9632 - positive - K - FALSE - 1
